attributes.action: ensure that all signs and obstructions on unlit roads are illuminated and do not rely on drivers headlamps to be seen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many local authorities now erect signs in the middle of the road which are unlit and rely on drivers dipped headlamps, which deploy to the left,to be seen.These are dangerous and should be independently lit.
